data.name: BulkSink_BatchSizeFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Number of documents in one batch

data.name: BulkSink_Database
data.value: Database name

data.name: BulkSink_Collection
data.value: One or more documents collection names. Use "[a-b]" placeholder to automatically generate collection index, e.g. "Data[0-2]" will result in the following collection names: Data0, Data1, Data2

data.name: BulkSink_MaxScriptSizeFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Size (in bytes) of the bulk insertion JSON array

data.name: BulkSink_PartitionKey
data.value: Optional. Name of the property to use as hash partitioning key. If not provided - records will be randomly distributed across all target collections

data.name: BulkSink_StoredProcFileFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Name of the file containing bulk insert stored procedure

data.name: ConnectionModeFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Specifies how to connect to DocumentDB account: {1}

data.name: ConnectionString
data.value: Connection string (example: "AccountEndpoint=xyz;AccountKey=xyz")

data.name: ParallelSink_Database
data.value: Name of the documents database

data.name: ParallelSink_Collection
data.value: Name of the documents collection

data.name: ParallelSink_ParallelRequestsFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Number of parallel document create requests

data.name: ParallelSink_PartitionKey
data.value: Optional. Path to the property to use as hash partitioning key (example: "/deviceId")

data.name: RetriesFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Number of retries on transient failures

data.name: RetryIntervalFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Retry interval on transient failures

data.name: Sink_CollectionThroughputFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Specifies maximum throughput of the collection

data.name: Sink_DatesFormat
data.value: Optional, default is {0}. Specifies how timestamps should be persisted: {1}

data.name: Sink_DisableIdGeneration
data.value: Optional. Disable automatic generation of document ids

data.name: Sink_IdField
data.value: Optional. Name of the source field that should be treated as document ID

data.name: Sink_IndexingPolicy
data.value: Optional. Indexing policy for the collection

data.name: Sink_IndexingPolicyFile
data.value: Optional. Path to the file containing indexing policy for the collection

data.name: Sink_UpdateExisting
data.value: Optional. Update existing documents with the same ID

data.name: Source_Database
data.value: Database name

data.name: Source_Collection
data.value: Regex pattern to match one or more documents collection names

data.name: Source_InternalFields
data.value: Optional. Preserve internal DocumentDB fields in the output

data.name: Source_Query
data.value: Optional. Documents query to execute

data.name: Source_QueryFile
data.value: Optional. Path to the file containing documents query
